description:
Path of Exile 2 is the highly anticipated sequel in the iconic ARPG series, and it's finally arriving on December 6. The initial release of Path of Exile 2 will be in early access, and players can only enter the early version if they purchase a specific pack of content on the developer's website. There will be a subsequent full release sometime in 2025, and the developers at Grinding Gear Games will unveil additional content as time goes on.

During the early access period of Path of Exile 2, players will only have access to some of the game's content. This includes a handful of the classes, half of the campaign, and presumably only a portion of the loot table. For now, you can check out the sectio
title: Path Of Exile 2: Release Date, Early Access, And Eveything We Know

description:
Plague Inc. developer Ndemic just dropped a surprise sequel to the smash hit Plague Inc. Instead of a pessimistic pandemic simulator, the sequel is a sunny strategy game about rebuilding after the end of the world.

After Inc. is set in the aftermath of Plague Inc.'s zombie scenario. It tasks you with running human civilization in the United Kingdom after a zombie apocalypse. Unlike its predecessors, After Inc. has an optimistic hue. The aesthetic is colorful and painterly, in contrast to the harsh UI of Plague Inc. or the cold satellite-map style of Rebel Inc., a previous follow-up about combating insurgencies.
title: A Surprise Plague Inc. Sequel Is Out Now, Centers On Healing The World After Apocalypse

description:
Video games have traditionally been an expensive hobby, but thanks to the latest advances in cloud streaming, it's now easier--and more affordable--than ever to get into gaming. One of the best cloud gaming services is Amazon Luna, which lets users play some of the latest games in up to 4K quality directly on devices they already own--no expensive console or gaming PC required. If that sounds like something you're interested in, we've put together this comprehensive explainer for Amazon Luna so you can see how easy it is to sign up and get playing.

What is Amazon Luna?
title: Everything To Know About Amazon Luna - These Black Friday Deals Will Get You Started

description:
What exactly does it mean for a game to be like Fortnite? That's a question that used to be a fairly simple one--Fortnite became popular as a battle royale, so "games like Fortnite" usually meant other battle royale games. The situation is a little bit different now that we're in Fortnite's seventh year of existence, as Epic Games' metaverse has grown in a lot of different ways. On top of that battle royale mode, there's Fortnite Festival, Lego Fortnite, Rocket Racing, and thousands of user-created islands in the bottomless pit that is Fortnite Creative.

Fortnite is still primarily known as a battle royale, judging by the player-counts--but the rest of Fortnite continues to grow. Some folks, like me, like to sample everything, and some tend to stay in the modes and games they already know they enjoy and don't feel much of an urge to explore. T
title: 17 Games Like Fortnite To Try Out In 2024

description:
Looking to add a few Blu-rays to your collection during Black Friday? Then swing by Amazon and check out all the Stanley Kubrick films on sale. Some of the director’s best films are steeply discounted right now, many of which are close to their all-time lowest prices.

One of our favorite deals is for The Shining (4K), as it’s seeing a generous $31 price cut. Now available for just $11, it gets you not just a 4K version of the classic film, but also three featurettes, a documentary covering the making of The Shining, and additional Blu-ray and digital copies.
title: Stanley Kubrick 4K Blu-Rays Are Cheap For Black Friday, Including The Shining For $11
B2G1 Free 4K Blu-Rays At Amazon: Deadpool & Wolverine, Aliens, Disney Originals, And More

description:
Although rapper Jarad Anthony Higgins--who was better known as Juice WRLD--passed away in 2019, he'll be a featured performer at the Fortnite Remix Finale Event this weekend. Players can log into Fortnite this week and receive a free cel-shaded Juice WRLD skin the next time they return to the game. In addition to that in-game outfit and the finale event, the late musical artist is also getting his own Fortnite island via Unreal Editor for Fortnite (UEFN).

Interscope Records, the Juice WRLD estate, and others collaborated to create the island to coincide with the rapper's final posthumous release, The Party Never Ends. The landscape of the island is built around a platform that leads players on a race to the top of a tower. If players need to rest before heading to the top, they can stop at the Xbox lounge and listen to some of Juice WRLD's previousl
title: Juice WRLD Is Getting His Own Fortnite Island And Xbox Controllers

description:
Quentin Tarantino is responsible for some of the most beloved films of all time, and now’s your chance to add them to your collection for cheap. Several of his best movies are on sale for Black Friday--bringing them down to incredibly low prices.

One of the most enticing offers is for Pulp Fiction (4K), as you’ll find it discounted to $16 (was $26). Along with a 4K copy of the movie, you’ll also get Blu-ray and digital formats. The two disc-set is packed with bonus features, including an enhanced trivia track, interviews with the cast, behind-the-scenes footage, deleted scenes, and a handful of featurettes.
title: Pulp Fiction, Reservoir Dogs, And Other Tarantino Blu-Rays Are Discounted For Black Friday

description: There are tons of discounts for streaming services this Black Friday, but few are as enticing as the one just revealed by Disney+. From now through December 2, you can pick up a Duo Basic Plan for just $3/month (was $11/month). Best of all, your discounted monthly fee will remain in effect for an entire year--allowing you to save $96 when signing up today.
title: Save $96 On A Year Of Disney+ And Hulu With This Great Black Friday Deal

description:
A long list of streaming services are discounted for Black Friday, including Peacock, Paramount+, and Max. The latter is particularly notable, as you’ll save $42 over the course of the six-month promotion--giving you a cheap way to check out hits like The Penguin and House of the Dragon. If you’re an Amazon Prime member, you’ll want to take a look at all the add-on services discounted for Black Friday, as now is a great time to bundle in services like AMC+, Discovery+, and Paramount+ with Prime Video for cheap.

Here’s a closer look at all the best streaming service deals for Black
title: Best Streaming Service Deals For Black Friday 2024: Hulu, Max, And Much More

description:
As the game industry prepares for Geoff Keighley's annual smorgasbord of news from The Game Awards, Devolver Digital has decided it's not going to wait until next month. Today, the publisher released Devolver Delayed 2024, a tongue-in-cheek awards show recognizing three games that have been pushed to 2025: Baby Steps, Stick It To The Stickman, and Skate Story.

Each game's delay was announced as a specific "award" given to the game against other fictional nominees. Specifically, the awards were named as follows:

  • Best Inadvertent Tripping Simulator - Baby Steps
  • Best Late Stage Capitalism Roguelite - Stick It To The Stickman
  • Best Glass Demon In A Leading Role - Skate Story
title: Devolver Delayed Awards 2024 Recognizes Three Games Being Delayed To 2025

description:
Black Friday rolls on with more and more deals, and one of the offers available now is a pretty great discount on the third-person shooter Returnal from developer Housemarque and Sony.

Amazon and Best Buy are currently selling the PlayStation 5 game for only $30, which is a nice discount off its usual $70 price point. Prime members can get fast and free shipping.

See at Best Buy
title: Get The PS5 Game Returnal For A Great Price Right Now For Black Friday

description: The Black Friday shopping season is here, and plenty of PlayStation games are on sale. If your'e looking for a copy of Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart, you're in luck, as Target and Best Buy have the game on PS5 for only $30 right now for the popular shopping season. It normally sells for $70.
title: Ratchet & Clank Rift Apart Is Only $30 Right Now On PS5 For Black Friday

description:
Helldivers 2 is one of 2024's best-selling games, and it's on sale right now for Black Friday. The retailers Best Buy and Walmart are selling the third-person shooter on PS5 for just $30. The game is also marked down nicely for its PC version.

See at Best Buy
title: Get Helldivers 2 For Only $30 For Black Friday
Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl $80 Limited Edition Is Finally Back In Stock At Amazon
Scott Pilgrim Graphic Novel Box Set Is Over 50% Off At Amazon

description: Despite its age, the DualShock 4 Wireless Controller is still quite expensive. And if you’re in the market for a new PS4 controller, consider looking at third-party alternatives to help you save a few bucks. The NYXI Wireless Controller for PS4 is a popular choice, and you’ll find it discounted to its lowest price ever for Black Friday.
title: Get A Wireless PS4 Controller For $24

description: The worlds of Disney and Pixar have been adapted into dozens of Lego sets over the years, and for Black Friday, you can grab a set based on one of the greatest animated movies of all time, Up. Normally $60, the house from Up is colorfully brought to life in this Lego kit. Five-hundred and ninety eight pieces can be used to construct the home of Carl Fredricksen, and for minifigures, you'll get the grumpy pensioner, intrepid Wilderness Explorer Russell, and the very good boy Dug.
title: Lego Pixar Up House Gets Big Black Friday Discount

description:
Fans of the zombie survival-horror game DayZ have taken a chunk out of its Steam user-score after developer Bohemia Interactive released a DLC that players say is overpriced and underwhelming. Now, the game's developer has responded to the criticism… by posting a Beatles song.

"Did you know that 8 million users for whom we have data on Steam played for an average of 188 hours and paid an average of 30 USD gross in Dayz?" Bohemia Interactive CEO Marek Spanel said on Twitter. "That means we received less than 10 cents for an hour of live online gaming, for which we host the online infrastructure and have been updating it for 10+ years. Yet DayZ Frostline is currently being review-bombed on the same platform for being too expensive: $26.99 for 'just a map,' and some users demand 'gimme more for less money.' Hmm. Please Please Me."
title: DayZ Developer Responds To Frostline DLC Review-Bombing On Steam

description: Black Friday is in full swing, and if you're looking for a copy of Gran Turismo 7, you're in luck. Walmart is selling the racing game on PS5 for $30 right now, which is among the best deals we've ever seen. If you'd prefer the PS4 edition, that's on sale at Walmart for only $20, which is a phenomenal price.
title: Gran Turismo 7 Is Available For A Fantastic Price Right Now During Black Friday

description:
Black Friday season is finally here, and a bunch of PlayStation exclusives are discounted for the shopping bonanza, including God of War Ragnarok. The latest entry in the series is on sale for only $30 right now at Best Buy and Walmart, which is an excellent discount off its normal $70 price point.

See at Best Buy
title: Get God Of War Ragnarok For A Great Price During Black Friday

description: Respawn's Star Wars Jedi games introduced Cal Kestis as a hero back in 2019, but for Black Friday, you can grab an action figure of the character that imagines a scenario where he joined the Galactic Empire. Available for $49 (was $80), this three-pack of Star Wars action figures from Hasbro's Black Series features the former Jedi as a member of the Inquisitor Corps: Jedi-hunting warriors looking to finish what Order 66 started.
title: The Hero Of Respawn's Star Wars Games Joins The Dark Side In This Black Friday Deal

description:
Not long after Mass Effect veteran Casey Hudson's new AAA studio closed its doors, another BioWare veteran's new venture has announced it is pausing operations.

Mac Walters, who worked at BioWare for nearly 20 years, split off in 2023 to make his own studio, Worlds Untold. However, Walters delivered some difficult news this week when he confirmed a decision to "pause operations at Worlds End" as the studio seeks out a "new partner" for its next game.

The phrasing here suggests something might have happened with NetEase, the partner that Worlds Untold was previously working with. In fact, NetEase was anno
title: Mass Effect Director's New Studio Pauses Operations As It Seeks New Partner

description:
For the past 15 years, League of Legends' seasons have been just a part of the game's ranked competitive play, with little impact on lore or events. From 2025, Riot will introduce a new seasonal model that's closer to other live-service games, with each year split up into three seasons that will tell a story based on one of the game's regions. The first, arriving in January, will be titled Welcome to Noxus.

The new seasons are a major overhaul for the long-running MOBA, with Welcome to Noxus launching as LoL: Season One. Each season will run for around eight patches, or 16 weeks, and most gameplay updates, modes, minigames, and champions will be connected to the season's overarching narrative. Each season will feature two battle passes, which will function similarly to LoL's current Event Pass, with both a paid and a free track. A number of extraneous rewards systems scattered across the game will be streamlined
title: League Of Legends Introduces New Seasonal Model With Welcome To Noxus

description:
Earlier this year, a terminally ill Borderlands fan named Caleb McAlpine put out what he described as a "long shot" plea to Gearbox to allow him to play Borderlands 4 before he passes away. According to McAlpine, his stage-4 cancer means he may have less than two years to live. Fortunately, Gearbox has come through for McAlpine and fulfilled his wish.

In an update posted to Reddit, McAlpine thanked everyone who supported his request and confirmed that Gearbox flew him and a friend out via first class to Gearbox's headquarters in Frisco, Texas. During his visit, McAlpine met the developers and Gearbox founder Randy Pitchford. He a
title: Terminally Ill Fan Was Able To Play Borderlands 4 Early, And He Says It's Amazing

description:
After 31 years, PlayStation icon Shuhei Yoshida is retiring from Sony Entertainment Interactive. The account-executive-turned-SIE-president--who stepped down from his former position back in 2019 in order to helm the company's Independent Developer Initiative--revealed the news via an interview shared on the official PlayStation Blog. Yoshida's last day with the company will be January 15, 2025.

"I've been with PlayStation from the beginning," Yoshida told Sony senior communications director Sid Shuman. "When I hit 30 years, I was thinking, 'Hmm, it may be about time for me to move on.' You know, the company's been doing great. I love PS5, I love the games that are coming out on this platform. And we have new generations of management who I respect and admire. And I'm so excited for the future of PlayStation. So you know, PlayStation is in really go
title: PlayStation Veteran Shuhei Yoshida Announces Retirement From Sony
Two Collections Of Batman's Greatest Animated Hits Just Received Massive Black Friday Discounts

description: Hulu is normally fairly generous to potential customers, offering a 30-day free trial that lets you check out the service before opening your wallet. The company is more generous than usual for Black Friday, however, as right now you can sign up for Hulu (ad-supported) for just $1/month. The deal is active until December 2.
title: Get A Full Year Of Hulu For Only $12 With This Superb Black Friday Streaming Deal
